attributes.action: National enquiry into the child rape gangs
attributes.additional_details: The poor little girls have been let down badly I am the father of two girls and the grandfather of four granddaughters I want them to be safe
attributes.background: I want parliament to push for a national enquiry the government will not hold one so it is up to the good people in parliament to force the government to take action

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
